price: Kuma ka ambaci Mũsã a cikin Littãfi. Lalle ne shi, yã kasance zãɓaɓɓe, kuma yã kasance Manzo, Annabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
